name: 黃如瑩
objective: 本課程旨在幫助學生經由閱讀與討論以了解全球共同面對的課題，包括：全球化的趨勢、文化衝突與恐怖主義、全球貧富差距、環境保護問題、基因工程所衍生的倫理道德問題等等。
schedule:
Unit One:  Global Warming
Week 1 ”Climate Change:  31 Days to Making A Difference”
Week 2  Selections from ”An Inconvenient Truth”
Week 3  Selections from ”Earth on the Balance”
Week 4  Screening of ”An Inconvenient Truth”
Unit Two:  Ecological Awareness and Environmantal Protection
Week 5  Selections from ”Silent Spring”
Week 6  Selections from ”Global Ecology”
Week 7  A case study:  The Battle of Chernobyl
Week 8  A case Study:  The Efforts of Erin Brockovich
Unit Three:  Global Terrorism
Week 9   Selections from ”The Spirit of Terrorism”
Week 10  A case study:  The attack on the Twin Tower and the Pentagon
Week 11  Selections from ”The Clash of Civilization?”
Week 12  A case Study:  United 93
Unit Four: Globalization
Week 13  Selections from ”The World Is Flat”
Week 14  Selections from ”Why Globalization Works”
Week 15  A case study
Week 16  Wrapping up and final paper due
scorePolicy:
1.  Attendance(individual): deduction of 5% final grades per absence
2.  Participation in group discussion and group work (group): 25%
3.  Performance in oral presentation (group): 50%
4.  Final paper(individual): 25%
materials:
DVDs:
An Inconvenient Truth
The Blue Butterflies
The Day After Tomorrow
Erin Brockovich
Attack on the Pentagon
United 93
